text: was a Japanese politician. He was the acting Prime Minister of Japan in 1980 after the sudden death of Masayoshi Ōhira. He was Foreign Minister from 1980 to 1981. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Japan Category:Politicians from Fukushima Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Foreign ministers of Japan Category:Chief Cabinet Secretaries of Japan
title: Masayoshi Itō
